oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dyer. Col. C.M. Dyer, 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: T.M. Schleier's Cartes de Visite, Nashville, TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. C.M. Dyer, 1864. Civil War soldier in formal portrait, wearing uniform, standing, holding hat. Taken in Nashville, TN.
